title: Senior Technology Executive, Architecture & Engineering
summary: Strategic and results-driven leader, known for disciplined execution and for helping organizations adopt emerging technologies for competitive advantage. Combines deep technical expertise with a proven ability to guide organizations through major transformation, with experience across aerospace, e-commerce, fintech, big tech, and automotive.

specialities.title: Multi-Cloud Native

specialities.title: Microservices & APIs

specialities.title: Technology Platforms
